predicate.note: Frames file for 'mire' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: be stuck

example.name: with passive trace
example.text: Temple added that Sea Containers is still mired *trace* in legal problems in Bermuda, where the Supreme Court has temporarily barred Sea Containers from buying back its own stock in a case brought by Stena and Tiphook.
example.arg: in Bermuda, where the Supreme Court has temporarily barred Sea Containers from buying back its own stock in a case brought by Stena and Tiphook

example.name: without passive trace
example.text: But it's just as plausible to argue that if even David Boren can get mired in this sort of mess, the problem goes beyond legal interpretation.

roleset.note: This should not even be considered a verb, really, since the active cannot occur: *"John mired Mary in a real mess."
